name: Medieval Market_VR Project
description:
An integrated group project by me and the team! I was responsible for designing and setup the VR environment.

Virtual Reality (VR) can be used as a bridge to shorten the distance between people and history and provide people with a more realistic experience. This project will take the little-known medieval history as the background and the medieval market as the project theme, allowing users to experience the medieval environment and architecture, and experience the medieval market.
